attributes.action: Make insurance companies give discounts to loyal customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people get their renewel notices without bothering to check out prices. I just got my car insurance renewel. If I approached the same company as a new customer, the figure quoted is over £50 per year. Why should customers have to go through the tedious process of cancelling an exisiting policy and then starting another when the companies can give automatic renewal notices based on the figures quoted on the internet? I will be doing this as £50 for me is a lot of money. Insurance companies make millions of profit because of this and this needs to stop
